review: "Prosa del Observatorio" is a mesmerizing blend of poetic prose and profound imagery. The way Julio Cortázar weaves together the celestial and the terrestrial, using the eel's life cycle as a metaphor, is both imaginative and evocative. The initial complexity and abstract nature of the text were a bit challenging, but once I delved deeper, the rich and emotional content resonated strongly. While not as visually driven as my favorite graphic novels, the book's lyrical style and deep philosophical insights make it a compelling read.
